DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to evaluate the efficacy of intense pulsed light in treating dry eye caused by meibomian gland dysfunction and make a comparison between the traditional treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Comparison of Two Kinds of Treatment in Treating Dry Eye Caused by Meibomian Gland Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: patients with dry eye syndrome and diagnosed as MGD an infection or inflammatory disease; ocular surgical history with in the last 3 months SGOGREN SYNDROME
